channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2595] Breaking: Prop. 8 Ruled Unconstitutional
item.description: U.S. District Judge Vaughn Walker has ruled that California’s Proposition 8, the ban on same-sex marriage, violates the U.S. Constitution. The ruling was released on Wednesday afternoon at approximately 1:40 p.m.

item.title: [+1712] Why You Shouldn't Dance Into Traffic (Video)
[+1646] 34 billionaires pledge to donate half their wealth
item.description: Thirty-four U.S. billionaires pledged Wednesday to give away at least 50 percent of their wealth to charity as part of a campaign by investor Warren Buffett and Microsoft founder Bill Gates.

item.title: [+1624] I always do this at the movies - The Oatmeal
item.description: I created a mini-blog within a blog today that contains some minor (less epic) updates and comics - basically stuff that doesn't warrant an entire comic but I can't really cram into Twitter either.

item.title: [+1360] A good wife (pic)
[+1029] Touché [Pic]
item.description: Nice way to describe your expressions

item.title: [+1013] WATCH:Colbert Calls Out Laura Ingraham For Racist Obama Book
item.description: Stephen Colbert had conservative talk radio host Laura Ingraham on his show last night and called her out for making the most "hideous, hackneyed racial stereotypes" in her new book about President Obama.

item.title: [+981] 12 Events That Will Change Everything [Interactive]
item.description: A media-rich, interactive look at 12 things that, if they occurred, would change life on Earth forever.

item.title: [+966] Should Videotaping the Police Really Be a Crime?
item.description: Prosecutors across the U.S. are making the dubious claim that videotaping the police in action violates wiretap laws. But that's a stretch, to put it mildly

item.title: [+937] President Obama to GOP: 'You can't have the keys back!'
item.description: Not until you learn how to drive. The president said the Republican Party lack one "single, solitary new idea" and are "betting on amnesia" to help them in November. He likened the GOP to a driver who has gone into a ditch, and after not helping to push the car out, demands the keys back.

item.title: [+803] Steve Jobs Photobomb (PIC)
item.description: Wait, who's that unassuming man in the background? Steve Jobs! he's just like us! He loves his artisan pizza.

item.title: [+663] How to protect a rape victim? Make her a rape "bait"
item.description: A former Upper St. Clair High School student who already claimed she had been raped once was raped again on school property after school officials used her as bait in a failed attempt to catch students they believed were having sex in the building, her attorneys claim.

item.title: [+615] Fossil Fuels Receive 12x More Subsidies Than Renewables
item.description: Global subsidies for fossil fuels dwarf support given to renewable energy sources such as wind and solar power and biofuels, a recent study shows.

item.title: [+589] Why Is the Bay Area Building a Suicide Barrier?
item.description: In a victory for suicide-prevention advocates, the San Francisco Bay Area's transportation committee is moving forward with plans to engineer and design a suicide barrier for the Golden Gate Bridge

item.title: [+574] Dog chews off owner's toe -- and may have saved owners life
item.description: We've done stories before on dogs sniffing out diseases their owners didn't even know they had. Now a little terrier named Kiko has one-upped all of them: He went ahead and performed surgery.

item.title: [+531] How Canada's Dollar Got Ahead, and Left America Behind
item.description: A couple of years ago, something went wrong. Our neighbors to the north became discontent with Tim Hortons, Doug Henning, Justin Bieber, and Jason Bay being their primary contributions to higher culture. All of a sudden, they wanted to beat us at capitalism, too. Today, five dollars U.S. buys five dollars CAN. (no longer a 15% discount)

item.title: [+524] The Guild: A Bollywood Themed Gamer's Anthem (Video)
item.description: Internet sabhi desh ko jodataa hai (The internet connects all nations)Frustration nikalanekaa raastaa hai (Provides an outlet for all frustrations)

item.title: [+513] The Most Brain-Scrambling 'Inception' Infographics
item.description: There are really only two possible questions to ask yourself after seeing "Inception": "What the hell just happened?" and "What the hell does it all mean?" But before you can answer the second question, you've got to tackle the first. And if you're anything like us, you could use a little help figuring it all out

item.title: [+512] Chewbacca Rides A Squirrel Into Battle Against Nazis!
item.description: It's a battle that is both frightening and awesome at the same time.

item.title: [+510] Meanwhile in India ... [Pic]
